text: Simon John Fairweather is an archer from Australia. Fairweather competed at the 1988, 1992, 1996, 2000, and the 2004 Summer Olympics.Simon FAIRWEATHER He was born on 9 October 1969.Simon Fairweather == References == Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Australian archers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Australia Category:Sportspeople from Adelaide
title: Simon Fairweather
